pkgmetadata.longdescription: Domain-Specific Language for Building PLS Structural Equation Models // A powerful, easy to write and easy to modify syntax for specifying and estimating Partial Least Squares (PLS) path models allowing for the latest estimation methods for Consistent PLS as per Dijkstra Henseler (2015, MISQ 39(2): 297-316), adjusted interactions as per Henseler Chin (2010) doi:10.1080/10705510903439003 and bootstrapping utilizing parallel processing as per Hair et al. (2017, ISBN:978-1483377445).
